Type.Name: CoverageLevel

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CoverageLevel extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Used to indicate how well a font can represent a particular ISO 10646 character point for a particular scrpt

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.CoverageLevel Approximate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The character is represented as basically the correct graphical form, but with a stylistic variant inappropriate for the current script

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.CoverageLevel Exact = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The character is represented as the correct graphical form.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.CoverageLevel Fallback = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The character is represented in a way that may be comprehensible but is not the correct graphical form

remarks.para: The character is represented in a way that may be comprehensible but is not the correct graphical form. For instance, a Hangul character represented as a a sequence of Jamos, or a Latin transliteration of a Cyrillic word.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.CoverageLevel None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The character is not representable with the font
